mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(pnum, ptype, pname, pct, pph, csn) VALUES (product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ptype}, #{pname}, #{pct}, #{pph}, #{csn})
INSERT INTO product_together_stock (pnum, ptsc, ptsq, ptst) VALUES (product_seq.CURRVAL, #{ptsc}, #{ptsq}, #{ptst})
INSERT INTO product_picture (ppnum, ppp, pnum) VALUES (product_picture_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ppp}, product_seq.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT p.pnum, p.pname, p.pph, cs.csc, cb.cbc, ts.ptsc, ts.ptsq FROM product p JOIN category_small cs ON p.csn = cs.csn JOIN category_big cb ON cb.cbn = cs.cbn JOIN product_together_stock ts ON p.pnum = ts.pnum ORDER BY pnum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
